name: Simulator X-Ray Cat
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-rays of cats.
Simulator X-Ray Cat Prank
Cat X-ray simulator - a game application joke, where you can do an x-ray cat. CAUTION This is not a real scanner, but only the emulator, the game The game is intended for entertainment and draw friends and loved ones!
Do you have a house cat or a cat? Act out your friends and family with the help of x-ray applications cat!
To use it, point to your cat or kitten, and then scan the result of surprise! The app does not any radiation and is completely safe for your health! The result is given rendomno!
Attention! This is not a real X-ray, it is designed to joke and play!
Thanks for playing with us, leave us your comments and suggestions, we will try to make the game even more interesting for you!
